reviewText: THIS IS FANTASTIC!!  It's not everyday something this special comes around, so check it out!  The puppets are so fun, sponge bob works great in stop motion!

I got this today at Walmart... its a whopping 22 minutes long for ten bucks. There are a couple special features, but hardly enough to justify the cost. Should of been more like five bucks. Wait for december, it's bound to be on tv.

This movie hasn't come out yet but I know it will be the greatest Christmas movie ever created. The world is a horrible place without Spongbob Squarepants and i'm so happy my husband bought it for my children.
Not in Spanish language. I wanted this for three kids becasue their father deserted them. We live in Mexicoand new movies are hard to find
My son love it
Grandson loves it
Wish that I would have watched the trailer first. Bad animation, and other episodes had nothing to do with Christmas. Would not buy again.

This Spongebob Christmas special has become a family tradition in my home. It is a very funny Spongebob episode in the style of claymation Christmas specials like Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer (1964), The Little Drummer Boy (1968), and Jack Frost (1979).

The plot involves Plankton's attempt to end Christmas by feeding Jerktonium to all the residents of Bikini Bottom. My favorite line comes from the Christmas carolers who have been turned into jerks: "Wrong bells, buddy!"

Note that the Christmas special comes bundled with another normal Spongebob episode, which is barely worth watching.
Just paid 15 dollars on this garbage. I thought it was an actual Christmas movie !  What a rip off AMAZON !!!!  They played this on TV for free. Shame on you

These work well. They snap on fast and my 3.5 year old cant open the doors with them on.  It requires hand strnegth he doesnt have and understanding how to do it of course.  Theyre easy to use as an adult.

Con:  they fall apart somewhat easily and need to be snapped back on sometimes but overall work well.
